TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableItemPattern/TableItemPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the column containing the table cell or item.
Docs.value: 以零為起始的序數數表示資料行包含資料表儲存格或項目。

remarks.format:
## Examples 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent>接聽程式會宣告為追蹤資料表內的項目資料表容器周遊。 每個焦點變更事件時，都會記錄項目屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnSpan As Integer
public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of columns spanned by a table cell or item.
Docs.value: 合併資料行數目。 預設值為 1。

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingGrid As AutomationElement

Docs.summary: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern control pattern and represents the table cell or item container.
Docs.value: [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 項目支援 GridPattern 控制項模式，並代表資料表資料格或項目容器。

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetColumnHeaderItems() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
Docs.returns: A collection of column header elements. The default is an empty array.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Retrieves all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
Docs.returns: A collection of row header elements. The default is an empty array.
